fields.name: Burning Blast (Cost 30%/15%):
fields.value: Can only be used when you are using Eldritch Blast. If the target survives the Night, their Defense Power is permanently reduced by 0.3x

fields.name: Solar Flare (Cost 75%/45%):
fields.value: Target a player. That player, along with anyone who visits them, will be hit with a 0.6x Attack Power attack.
